import { PagedData, PageEvent, SortEvent } from 'src/@enigmatry/pagination';

import { ListMockItem } from 'src/app/api/api-reference';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-list',
  templateUrl: './list.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./list.component.scss'],
  changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush
})
export class ListComponent {

  @Input() data: PagedData<ListMockItem> | null;
  @Input() loading: boolean;

  @Input() showPaginator = true;
  @Input() showFirstLastButtons = false;
  @Input() pageSizeOptions = [10, 50, 100];
  @Input() hidePageSize = false;

  @Input() rowSelectable = false;
  @Input() multiSelectable = false;

  @Input() columns: ColumnDef[] = [
{ field: 'id', header: 'Id', hide: true, sortable: true, type: '' },
{ field: 'name', header: 'Name', hide: false, sortable: false, type: '' },
{ field: 'date', header: 'Date', hide: false, sortable: true, type: 'date' }
];

  @Output() pageChange = new EventEmitter<PageEvent>();
  @Output() sortChange = new EventEmitter<SortEvent>();
  @Output() selectionChange = new EventEmitter<ListMockItem[]>();
